name: Canonical Tag
description: Checks if canonical URL is set

name: Internal Links Count
description: Counts internal links on the page

name: Image Alt Text
description: Checks that all images have alt text

name: Text-to-HTML Ratio
description: Ratio of visible text to HTML code

name: Keyword in URL
description: Checks if primary keyword is in URL

name: Social Share Buttons
description: Checks if social share buttons exist

name: Viewport Meta
description: Checks viewport meta tag for mobile

name: Canonical Redirect
description: Checks if page redirects to canonical

name: Broken Links Count
description: Counts broken links on the page

name: Image File Sizes
description: Checks if images are optimized for web

name: Lazy Loading Images
description: Checks if lazy loading is used

name: Video Tags Optimization
description: Checks if video elements have titles/alt

name: Alt Attribute Keywords
description: Checks if alt attributes include keywords

name: Internal Link Depth
description: Measures average clicks to important pages

name: HTTPS Mixed Content
description: Checks for mixed content on HTTPS pages

name: URL Length
description: Checks if URL length is SEO-friendly

name: Schema Breadcrumb
description: Checks if breadcrumb schema is present

name: Schema Article
description: Checks if article schema is present

name: Internal Link Anchor Diversity
description: Checks diversity of internal link anchors

name: Outbound Link Anchor Diversity
description: Checks diversity of outbound link anchors

name: Duplicate Content
description: Checks for duplicate content on same site

name: Canonical Self-reference
description: Checks if canonical points to self

name: Meta Charset
description: Checks if charset meta is defined

name: Link Titles
description: Checks if anchor tags have title attributes

name: Mobile Tap Targets
description: Checks button & link sizes on mobile

name: SVG Images
description: Checks usage and optimization of SVGs

name: Link Target Blank
description: Checks links opening in new tab

name: Open Graph Images
description: Checks OG images exist and size

name: Keyboard Navigation
description: Checks if site is navigable via keyboard

name: Focus Outline
description: Detects focus outlines for interactive elements
